entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2.
